title: Who are some good French musicians? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello, I adore Camille Saint-Saëns - Le Cygne (The Swan)  I am passionate about CARMEN, George Bizet  I love Maurice Ravel - the Bolero  I also enjoy Hector Berlioz - La Damnation de Faust  I like also Claude Debussy - Clair de Lune, Moonlight - D flat major  I hope you will also enjoy these French musicians.

Unfortunately, I can't find a great French classical Musician. I love Beethoven, Mozart, Vivaldi, Malher but I don't like so much any French classical musicians enough to mention them here . Otherwise, I think that Michel Legrand , who passed away a few time ago, was a great musician . He carried off many prices all along his career. He made many peaces of music for movies. Francis Lai, another French musician , who made many theme music, especially for the Claude Lelouch French director. And, Jean-Michel Jarre who has been experimenting with electronic music since 1972. He is a groundbreaker electronic music who worked with the greatest. ( Vangelis)
